text:
The two-day photo exhibition showcasing achievements of the State government, organised by the Department of Information and Public Relation, at Christopher bus stand in Vadasery here attracted over 50,000 visitors.

The exhibition was inaugurated by Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan on Wednesday to mark the 68th birth day of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa in the presence of former Minister N. Thalavai Sundaram, MLAs K.T. Pachaimal, A. Nanjil Murugesan and local body representatives.

Photo exhibitions are also being conducted in villages at regular intervals, according to official sources.
title: Photo expo attracts 50,000 visitors
